title: Royal Designs, Inc. Deep Empire Lamp Shade - Eggshell - 5 x 13 x 8
features: DIMENSION: Our traditional basic empire lamp shade measures 6" x 12" x 9.25" (Top Diameter x Bottom Diameter x Slant Height)
MATERIALS: Our classic lamp shade is made from premium silk-type shantung fabric and sturdy off-white styrene lining.
EASY TO USE: The standard spider fitter works with most lamps and is held in place by any final or cap.
TRADITIONAL DESIGN: Works perfectly with floor lamps or tall table lamps with a small to medium base. Our shade will also fit in beautifully in transitional and modern home decors.
APPLICATION: Use our lamp shade for table lamps, accent lamps, vintage lamps and even candlestick lamps! The timeless design is great for any room.
description: The Deep Empire Basic Lamp Shade is part of the Royal Designs, Inc. Timeless Basic Shade Collection and is a traditional yet stunning way to finish the look of your lamp. Our fancy lamp shade makes a subtle statement and will turn your floor lamp or table lamp into a talking piece. We have decades of experience in the business of lamp shades and we're proud to offer multiple product lines that exemplify handcrafted quality and value. Be sure to browse our vast collection of shades in a wide variety of distinctive shapes that will add a new level of sophistication to your lighting and home decor.
